title: oce lol client slow loading
body:
having issues with log in taking ages. 
get stuck at the champion declaration
get stuck at ban
I've restarted both my PC and Router still the same.
speed test is about 80Mbps on nbn. 
in game speed is fine. 

Anyone else having the same issue?

replies.body: Yes, exactly the same issue here...
Hi Veela, Kotan are you guys on myrepublic ISP?

> [{quoted}](name=magicgirl,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=iQVJLe0G,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-11-28T13:02:20.207+0000)
>
> Hi Veela, Kotan are you guys on myrepublic ISP?

Hi MagicGirl,

I live with Kotan and am having the same issue. We are with Orcon ISP.
Yeah same here, anybody seen any fixes?
